title: You Can Never Find a Rickshaw When It Monsoons - The World on One Cartoon a Day
description: ONE GRADUATE'S JOURNEY TO FIND HIS PLACE IN THE WORLDIn 1990, before embarking on his groundbreaking children's book career, Mo Willems packed a small bag and a sketchbook and set out to explore the world--by place, car, boat, bus, motorcycle, and rickshaw. At the end of each day, he drew a cartoon of the one event that stuck out in his mind, from the sublime to the ridiculous. This is his sketch diary.
author: Mo Willems
